item.title: n维超球坐标系
item.description: 一、n维超球坐标系 我们知道2维极坐标系 $(r,\theta)$ 和笛卡尔坐标系 $(x_1,x_2)$ 之间的转换关系如下： $$ x_1 = r\cos(\theta), x_2 = r\sin(\theta) $$ 依次类推，我们可以定义n维空间内的超球坐标系 $(r,\theta_1,…,\theta_{n-1})$ ( 其中$\theta_1,\theta_2,\cdots,\theta_{n-2}\in [0, \pi], \theta_{n-1}\in [0, 2\pi)$ ), 其中$r$为径向坐标， $\theta_1,…,\theta_n$ 为角度坐标。它们和笛卡尔坐标系 $(x_1,x_2,…,x_n)$ 的转换关系如下： $$ \begin{aligned} x_1 &= r\cos(\theta_1)\\ x_2 &= r\sin(\theta_1)\cos(\theta_2)\\ x_3 &= r\sin(\theta_1)\sin(\theta_2)\cos(\theta_3)\\ &\cdots \\ x_{n-1} &= r\sin(\theta_1)\sin(\theta_2)\cdots\sin(\theta_{n-2})\cos(\theta_{n-1})\\ x_n &= r\sin(\theta_1)\sin(\theta_2)\cdots\sin(\theta_{n-2})\sin(\theta_{n-1}) \end{aligned} $$ $$ \begin{aligned} r &= \sqrt{x_1^2+x_2^2+x_3^2+\cdots+x_{n-1}^2+x_n^2}\\ \theta_1 &= \operatorname{atan2}(\sqrt{x_n^2+x_{n-1}^2+\cdots+x_2^2}, x_1)\\ \theta_2 &= \operatorname{atan2}(\sqrt{x_n^2+x_{n-1}^2+\cdots+x_3^2}, x_2)\\ &\cdots\\ \theta_{n-2} &= \operatorname{atan2}(\sqrt{x_n^2+x_{n-1}^2}, x_{n-2})\\ \theta_{n-1} &= \operatorname{atan2}(x_n, x_{n-1}) \end{aligned} $$ 其中atan2是值域在$(-\pi, \pi]$的反正切函数。

item.title: Python常用正则表达式
item.description: 1、匹配所有数字(含科学计数法) [-+]?\d+(\.\d+)?([eE][-+]?\d+)? 2、匹配所有数字(不含科学计数法) [-+]?\d+(\.\d+)?

item.title: Add Gitalk for Comments in Hugo
item.description: Gitalk is a comment plug-in developed based on Github Issue and Preact. It cleverly uses the function of github issue to develop a plug-in, which requires users to have a github account. First, you need to choose a public github repository (existing or create a new one) for storing comments Then you need to create GitHub the Application , if not click here to apply , Authorization callback URLfill out the domain name currently used plug-in page.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Simple Shortcode to Insert Raw HTML in Hugo
item.description: I love the simplicity of creating new content using markdown in Hugo. But sometimes, markdown is not enough – you might want to do a one-off extra-fancy thing with raw html. Surprisingly, Hugo doesn’t seem to have a good way to let you do this in a content file. Here is how to create your own one-line custom shortcode to make that possible. Add a shortcode template to your site, in layouts/shortcodes/rawhtml.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
